thread.title: Live: PM Narendra Modi addresses election rally in Bahraich
thread.title_full: Live: PM Narendra Modi addresses election rally in Bahraich

author: FE Online
title: Live: PM Narendra Modi addresses election rally in Bahraich
text:
Live: PM Narendra Modi addresses election rally in Bahraich Live: PM Narendra Modi addresses election rally in Bahraich Uttar Pradesh Assembly elections 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is addressing two election rallies in Bahraich and Basti today. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 23, 2017 1:56 PM Narendra Modi (PTI) 
Live updates of his rallies 
Uttar Pradesh Assembly elections 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is addressing two election rallies in Bahraich and Basti today. Earlier in the day, polls for the fourth phase has begin for 53 Assembly constituencies spreading over 12 districts. The fourth phase of elections in crucial for the BJP as it doesn’t have any MLA in any of the 53 constituencies going to the polls today. In 2012, the ruling SP had won 24 seats out of 53, BSP 15, Congress 6 and others 3. A number of heavyweight candidates are contesting in this phase. hey include sitting MLA Aradhana Mishra from Rampur Khas (Pratapgarh), the daughter of Congress MP Pramod Tiwari, and Independent MLA and minister Raghuraj Pratap Singh alias Raja Bhaiya. 
1:55 PM: Am surprised that UP CM and ministers have not given their performance report to the people. They haven’t live to their promises. 
1:53 PM: Uttar Pradesh is united to bring BJP in power he says. 
1:51 PM: Wanted to come here earlier, but could come now, he says 
1:49 PM: PM Modi begins his peech in Bahraich. Please Wait while comments are loading...
